author: aminlee9
comment: some are pass/fail in a sense it's a waste of time as you simply need to submit something (of minimal quality) to pass the subject that does not affect your gpa at all, but is needed for you to move to the next sem. some are graded that will actually contribute to your gpa. chck ur school's handbook for more details
